name: MIPgen
tagline: One stop MIP design and analysis
body:
Welcome.

MIPgen is a fast, simple way to generate designs for MIP assays targeting hundreds or thousands of genomic loci in parallel.

Packaged with MIPgen are scripts that aid in visualization of MIP designs and processing of MIP sequence reads to SAM files that can then be passed through any standard variant calling pipeline.

MIPgen is provided freely for non-commercial use. Contact Jay Shendure (shendure [at] uw.edu) for commercial application opportunities.

Created by Evan Boyle, University of Washington Department of Genome Science
